SELECT * FROM fangzhu WHERE openid=#{openid} AND stat = 2

SELECT id, openid, name, nick_name as nickName, avatar_url as avatarUrl, province, city, phone, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, num, fc_num as fcNum, yk_num as ykNum, stat FROM fangzhu
AND stat = #{stat}
AND stat != 0
AND name LIKE concat('',#{name},'%')
AND phone LIKE concat('',#{phone},'%')
order by id DESC
